q.quote: If youth knew; if age could.
q.author: Sigmund Freud

q.quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
q.author: Francis Beaumont

q.quote: The least movement is of importance to all nature. The entire ocean is affected by a pebble.
q.author: Blaise Pascal

q.quote: I buy expensive suits. They just look cheap on me.
q.author: Warren Buffett

q.quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
q.author: Anne Campbell

q.quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
q.author: Twyla Tharp

q.quote: Even in winter an isolated patch of snow has a special quality.
q.author: Andy Goldsworthy

q.quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.
q.author: Orson Scott Card

q.quote: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
q.author: Xenophon

q.quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved.
q.author: Vivien Leigh

q.quote: I think it is in collaboration that the nature of art is revealed.
q.author: Steve Lacy

q.quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially if it's about the future.
q.author: Niels Bohr

q.quote: I think in terms of the day's resolutions, not the years'.
q.author: Henry Moore

q.quote: I make pictures and someone comes in and calls it art.
q.author: Willem de Kooning
